name: siddash
description: BSD Portfolio & Backend API - Monorepo with concurrent startup capabilities

scripts.start:portfolio: cd bsd-portfolio && cross-env PORT=3000 npm start
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=3001 npm start
scripts.dev:portfolio: cd bsd-portfolio && cross-env PORT=3000 npm start
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=3001 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd bsd-portfolio && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
